meanings.definition: A group of complex carbohydrates found in connective tissues.
meanings.sent1: Chondroitins provide support and structure to our body's tissues.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend consuming chondroitins to maintain healthy joints.
meanings.sent3: When the chondroitins decided to have a party, all the tissues showed up!
meanings.sent4: The chondroitins in our body act like the glue holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: Imagine chondroitins as tiny builders constructing our connective tissues.

meanings.definition: A substance used in dietary supplements for joint health.
meanings.sent1: Include chondroitins in your diet for better joint mobility.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often take chondroitins to support their joints during intense training.
meanings.sent3: The chondroitins in the supplement bottle were excited to help improve joint health.
meanings.sent4: Her joints felt as strong as steel beams after taking chondroitins regularly.
meanings.sent5: Chondroitins are like little helpers repairing and maintaining our joints.
